io.fluo.api.client

Interface Transaction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, SnapshotBase, TransactionBase
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TypedTransaction

    public interface Transaction
extends TransactionBase, AutoCloseable
    Enables users to read and write to Fluo at a certain point in time. Transaction extends TransactionBase to include the commit() and close() methods as users are responsible for committing and closing resources when using Transaction.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes resources
      void commit()
      Commits the transaction.

      • Methods inherited from interface io.fluo.api.client.TransactionBase

        delete, set, setWeakNotification

      • Methods inherited from interface io.fluo.api.client.SnapshotBase

        get, get, get, get

    • Method Detail

      • commit

        void commit()
            throws CommitException
        Commits the transaction. A CommitException will be thrown if the commit failed.
        Throws:
        CommitException

      • close

        void close()
        Closes resources
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
